ygData.subject: Re: which stat?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a couple questions then.   I have a 21st monk and im wondering what kind of rings to wear.  Whats better Plat fire emarlad +5 str +5 dex or the black
ygData.messageBody:
I have a couple questions then. I have a 21st monk and im wondering what
kind of rings to wear. Whats better Plat fire emarlad +5 str +5 dex or the
black pearl 6 dex/agil . I know later on that str will increase your
punchingdamage(correct me if im wrong) and dex of course is better chance to
hit. Well i seem to swing the same amount when i took of gold wedding rings
+5 agil and put on those fire emrald. What im tring to say is the higher
level monks out thier should i dump fire emarld and go with black pearl or
what?? Also a good power leveling spot to hunt at 21? i here gargoyles in
ocean of tears will be good.

Thanks for any help,

Bismatal
----- Original Message -----
From: Imari J. A. Dellimore <ijad@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, September 10, 1999 10:44 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] which stat?


> From: "Imari J. A. Dellimore" <ijad@...>
>
> In the VERY long run you should shoot for some rings/bracers that give
> both AGI and DEx.
>
> I currently use 2 platinum Black pearl rings - +6 AGI/DEX (yes it
> increases both) *costs about 550pp each and is player made*
>
> 2 earings *cant remember the name, but they are jeweler crafted also* :
> +4str/2int *costs about 175pp each*
>
> One platinum black pearl choker - 7Agi/7Dex *150pp I think I paid for it
> - jeweler crafted also!*
>
> and of course two serpentine bracers. *found on the animated hand in lower
> guk*
>
> There also armor pieces like Executioner hood, dwarven work boots
> Lizardscale gloves that give DEX and other bonuses.
>
> My dex is currently 134 and Agility is 129
> I realize that at level 15 you can't really afford any of these, but its
> always nice to know what is out there.
>
> Good luck - personally I would go with AGI (improve your ac and balcking
> ability)
>
>
> On Fri, 10 Sep 1999, Dizzy J. wrote:
>
> > From: "Dizzy J." <dizzyj@...>
> >
> > > > I appeal to the wisdom of the group once again. I'm a 15th level
monk
> > > > starting to assemble a nice set of armor, but I'm a bit naive when
it
> > > comes
> > > > to jewelry. Which stat is more valuable to raise with jewelry, DEX
or AGI?
> > >
> > > Both. :)
> > >
> > and str. str apparently has a direct relation to your atk value.
> >
> > I would try to balance the three.
> >
> >
